amendment.description: To expand funding for the High Intensity Drug Trafficking Area (HIDTA) Program, offset through reductions in Function 920; and to ensure that HIDTA funding remains in ONDCP.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3168 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3168 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Baucus. (consideration: CR S2271-2272; text: CR S2271) To expand funding for the High Intensity Drug Trafficking Area (HIDTA) Program, offset through reductions in Function 920; and to ensure that HIDTA funding remains in ONDCP.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3168 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3168 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Baucus.
